reviews.review: Juego de puzzle obligatorio para todo el que se considere gamer. Pulido, dificultad ascendente, tutorial sin ser tutorial, un juego con todas las letras, entretenido, desafiante, divertido.

I COULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS MORE! If you're planning on buying this, I highly recommend playing the original Portal first. You can get them together for $15. It is SUCH AN ADVENTURE. The characters are amazing, and the story- wow the story- I love it.
Absolutely great game! Great puzzles, great atmosphere and great story! Would recommend to anybody.

This is and was one of the best games that ive ever played. The atmosphere is both humorous and tense. The puzzles were hard but satisfying to complete and the story line was great. I litelary have no improvements on this game other then graphics which were good back when this was released. Overall i completly and totaly recommend putting all your attention on this game even if you havent played the first.

I think I get it now. I think I understand why Portal 2 is the greatest game of all time. I don't know why it took me so long, but I get it now. It's the fact that the game has so much content, something is bound to appeal to you. People love the story of Portal 2 and how it recontextualizes the first game, for good reason. The story of what happened at Aperature captivates people, obviously. But the gameplay is relatively standard compared to the first game, with some new mechanics added. I'm not gonna get too into it, but it's very clear that the Multiplayer is a big factor as well, for good reason. It allows for so many unique ideas that wouldn't be possible in singleplayer. There's also a level creator, allowing you to do the obvious, allowing people to express their creative wings through portal. If you are a fan of first person shooters, multiplayer games, story-focused games, level creators, the like, something in Portal 2 will appeal to you. I whole-heartedly reccomend it.

Fun fact if you're obsessive like I am, please PLEASE don't find a friend who will play games like this with you. For multiple months all I did all day every day was play this alone and then community chambers with a friend after midnight every night. It is an amazing game but it's downfall is it is too good and will become a permanent part of your soul.
Be careful kids.
